Title: Requires that all printed political campaign mailing pieces, containing or made of recyclable material, include a message about recycling the printed materials
Summary: Requires that all printed political campaign mailing pieces, containing or made of recyclable material, include a message about recycling the printed materials.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring that all printed political campaign mailing pieces, containing or made of recyclable material, include a message about recycling the printed materials
